chargeHist.descr: Battery to Law Enforcement Officers, Fire Fighters or Commission Wardens
Battery to Law Enforcement Officers, Fire Fighters or Commission Wardens

result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Ritchie R. Gordon
Current: 600 12th Ave West 36, Menomonie, WI 54751 United States  (Effective: 10-23-2014)
Prior: 1122 Douglas St., Menomonie, WI 54751

Defendant, Ritchie R. Gordon with Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson appeared.  Prosecuting attorney Aaron Olson.  Kim Silvius - Clerk
(10:42)  MULTIPLE CASES HEARD.
Harrelson - plea to Ct 1 14CF128 balance of counts, 14CF36 & 13CT228 dismissed - 14CM152 Ct 1 Eau Claire Co case would dismiss if pleads to Dunn Co case and requests Bail Jumping read in 
joint 2 yrs prob w/held, cond jail time 96 days, huber, release for treatment & child care (2 weeks in and 2 weeks out), no contact with Eau Claire victims (Luther Hosp & guard) , restitution if any on EC case, AODA, pysch counseling, STD testing, cc $268 + $200

State - 4 1/2 months conditional days - credit 39 days so just asking for 96 days jail
Deft requests 60 days to report

Deft 14CF128 Ct 1 pleads no contest - waives rights & jury trial

Harrelson - not certain what restitution is in EC case
State - ADA in EC would deal with restitution at their hearing to dismiss
Parties stipulate to facts

COURT:  14CF128 Ct 1 plea voluntary - finds deft guilty
w/held 2 years probation
$268 cc - PAYMENT PLAN***
$200 surchg - PAYMENT PLAN***
  CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
96 days jail - start on Dec 12, 2014 at 5 p.m. - huber for treatment & child care - serve two weeks in and two weeks out to keep social security
no contact with victims in EC Co. case (Luther Hospital & security guards at hospital)
AODA & comply with any treatment
psych eval & counseling if required
compass eval.
apology letters to victims
STD testing
Restitution not to exceed $500 

DISMISS & READ-IN:  13CT228, 14CF36, 14CF128 Ct 2, 3, 4 and Eau Claire Case 14CM152 Ct 1

Defendant, Ritchie R. Gordon with Attorney Jeremiah James Harrelson appeared.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew John Maki.  Kim Silvius - Clerk

COURT:  grants continuance
